medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports approximately 10 hours of right lower quadrant abdominal pain that began upon waking from sleep. The pain is localized to the right lower quadrant. Shortly after the onset of pain, the patient experienced nausea and has had 5 episodes of non-bloody, non-bilious emesis. The patient reports no appetite today and denies any fevers or chills. Denies a history of constipation or diarrhea, but had one bowel movement today. Denies any urinary symptoms.
